mapper.insert: insert into t_user_notification (notify_id, user_id, less_id, notify_type, notify_dttm) values (#{notificationId}, #{userId}, #{lessonId}, #{notificationType}, #{notificationDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
